title: both teams just lagged and crashed anyone having issues?
body: I just had a game all of us lagged out and crashed. Only 6 of us made it back in game for the remake whats going on?

replies.body: I don't see any records of gameserver issues. Did this happen in any other matches or just that one?
it happened for 3 games then i gave up. one remade others crashed in lobby champ select

If you're still seeing this happen, we'll need to take a look at your network routing to find the common cause of these drops, but first, we'll need to ensure your local network settings are in the clear. To do this, simply follow all the steps listed in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and get back to me if you still see disconnections from matches after you've worked through those steps.
Yeah me and my friend both crashed while waiting for a match. Ever since then my client has been still buggy and keeps trying to reconnect even though my internet is fine.
